sendMessages.label: Toɓɓere yamiroore nde ɗaɓɓi ngam neldude mesaas
sendMessages.tooltip: 0 firti ko terɗe ɗee kala ina mbaawi neldude mesasuuji, tawa kadi limoore ɓurnde mawnude ndee firti ko yamiroore ɓurnde toowde ina ɗaɓɓi

invite.label: Tolno yamiroore ina ɗaɓɓi noddude terɗe kese
invite.tooltip: Set hol baawɗo noddude terɗe kese e nder suudu nduu

kick.label: Ƴeewto tolno yamiroore ɗaɓɓaaɗe
kick.tooltip: Set hol baawɗo yaltinde terɗe suudu nduu

ban.label: Tolno yamiroore ina ɗaɓɓi ngam haɗde terɗe
ban.tooltip: Set hol baawɗo haɗde terɗe suudu

PermissionSettingsContent.description: Tolno tolno njaru : 0-100, so limoore ndee ina mawni ina firta yamiroore ɓurnde toowde ina ɗaɓɓi
